entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
